s.text: However, if elections are won by Authenticity + Balls (your version of my Happiness + Guyism), then Ventura looks like a winner, doesn't he?
By the way, I disobeyed you.
Here's a cute-but-frightening true fact I just discovered: My 9-year-old daughter knows the name of Rupert Murdoch's new wife.
And Coliseum Books was relieved when my publisher called and suggested we might want to think about rescheduling the reading there on account of Floyd's torrents.
So, when you get back, I'll come to your apartment, read all the passages about private jets out loud, and sign your copy of the book.
